com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.popup

Class DynamicArrayPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.popup.DynamicPopup
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.popup.DynamicArrayPopup

  • public class DynamicArrayPopup
extends DynamicPopup
    A simple PopupWindow to display a list of items. It will be used internally by the DynamicSpinnerPreference but it can be used by the other views also.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.popup.DynamicPopup
